title: AreaTrend.com Converts to HTTPS with HSTS for Customer Security
text:
New York City, New York (October 22nd, 2015) – Trendsetters everywhere can now shop with confidence in more than just their sense of style. AreaTrend.com, the online mecca of chic, name brand accessories at affordable prices, is taking customer satisfaction to the next level as they announce the conversion of their entire website to Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure (HTTPS) for enhanced customer security.
Style savvy shoppers trust AreaTrend to provide the best selection of top brand accessories , shoes , jewelry , and more without breaking the bank. The added security of HTTPS+HSTS to what was already a Google Trusted Store, ensures that no one will be breaking any banks on their watch. This new level of security stops just short of preventing nosy boyfriends and girlfriends from checking out the browser history to see what holiday gifts are coming their way.
Enabling the website with HTTPS+HSTS ensures that the transmission of data is encrypted to prevent the leakage of sensitive information that can lead to identity theft. This enhanced security allows AreaTrend’s contented fashionistas to keep clicking away at all those beautiful purses without the threat of a sticky-fingered cookie hijacker stealing their matching wallet.
Adding this level of security emphasizes AreaTrend’s focus on providing superior service to its sophisticated clientele. Fashionistas will find that their Google searches yield results with secure sites listed closer to the top, and in those search results, they will find their good friend, AreaTrend.
Secure checkout options include MasterCard, Visa, American Express, Discover, PayPal and Pay With Amazon. AreaTrend’s fashion forward shoppers also enjoy a 365-day hassle-free return policy, free exchanges, low-price guarantee, and free shipping on all domestic orders.
